stable.changelog:
System Tray Support:
- Application now starts with system tray enabled by default
- No need for manual --tray flag
- Minimize to tray for background operation

Auto-Update Test:
- First test of auto-update system
- Update notification should appear for v1.0.0 users

beta.changelog:
System Tray Support (Beta):
- Same as stable channel for v1.0.1
